name: Simple Blocks Lines Textured 3d Dichroic Glass Necklace
description:
Stunning is the simplicity of the design
Textured 3d lines and blocks create this wonderful wearable dichroic glass art piece.
Created not by fusing the glass flat,but creating a wonderful layered effect of smaller pieces of glass fused to create depth,shine and textue
Lovely metallics on this piece.
Measures approx 3cm tall

Attached to an 18" silver plated snake chain
This can be substituted for an 18" black organza ribbon and cord necklace please see my other dichroic glass necklaces to view it.

name: The Aztec Series Glass Textured Necklace
description:
The Aztec Series
Fusing glass shapes to create an overall textured and 3d effect
Beautiful colours on this piece including rainbow and oil slick sparkles.
The piece measures approx 2.9cm tall
Attached to an 18" silver plated snake chain
However if you would like the 18" black organza ribbon and cord necklace as seen on some of my other dichroic necklaces please just leave me a note at check out and i'll switch it over.

name: Aqua Rainbow Abstract Textured Dichroic Glass Necklace
description:
Aqua with bold glass abstract shapes
Fusing glass shapes to create an overall textured and 3d effect
Beautiful multi colours on this piece 
The piece measures approx 3.2cm tall
Attached to an 18" silver plated snake chain
However if you would like the 18" black organza ribbon and cord necklace as seen on some of my other dichroic necklaces please just leave me a note at check out and i'll switch it over.

name: Raindrop Bubbles-Dichroic and Fused Glass 3d Textured Necklace
description:
Breathtakingly Beautiful - Raindrop Bubbles
A one of a kind art piece,created by fusing layers of glass.
Ultimate depth,sparkle and shine,to this beautiful piece.

This piece is a highly fire polished piece that is totally mesmerising in every way,watch as it changes pattern when you move and it catches the light,a true wearable piece of art.
I have attached the pendant to an 18" black organza and ribbon cord necklace,however if you would rather have a chain i have 18" silver plated snake or curb.

The pendant measures 2 inches long

name: Ripples-Dichroic and Fused Glass 3d Textured Necklace
description:
Breathtakingly Beautiful - Ripples
A one of a kind art piece,created by fusing layers of glass.
Ultimate depth,sparkle and shine,to this beautiful piece.

This piece is a highly fire polished piece that is totally mesmerising in every way,watch as it changes pattern when you move and it catches the light,a true wearable piece of art.
I have attached the pendant to an 18" black organza and ribbon cord necklace,however if you would rather have a chain i have 18" silver plated snake or curb.

The pendant measures 1.1/2 inches long x just under an inch wide
